name: Never Stop Hopping
description:
Never Stop Hopping is a short yet fun game where you play as a little bunny and traverse across a snowy-themed environment full of many different unique challenges. 

Collect 10 of the carrots found around the stage to be granted an extra life!

Visit the hub world at the beginning of each level to trade 5 carrots for an extra life!

Encounter fearsome enemies and avoid their movements.

Collect the fallen star to gain a double jump!
